titleStmt.title: The roote of Romish rites and ceremonies shevving that the Church of Rome hath borrowed most part of her ceremonies of the Iewes & ancient pagans, and that from this spring proceeded the Iubile. First written in French by M. Charles Drelincourt, Minister of Gods word in the Reformed Church of Paris; and now translated into English by M.T.
Du jubilé des églises reformées; avec l'examen du jubilé de l'église romaine. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Drelincourt, Charles, 1595-1669.

First written in French by M. Charles Drelincourt, Minister of Gods word in the Reformed Church of Paris; and now translated into English by M.T.

notesStmt.note: A translation of part 2, chapter 11 of Drelincourt, Charles. Du jubilé des églises reformées; avec l'examen du jubilé de l'église romaine.
